headline.main: THREE DAYS LATER FROM EUROPE.; Funds Steady--Money Easy--Slight Advance in Cotton--Breadstuffs Dull. VIEWS OF THE BRITISH AND FRENCH PRESS. Outrages Upon and American Missionary in Syria. ARRIVAL OF THE AFRICA. INTERESTING DEBATES IN PARLIAMENT. Later and Important from India and China.

docs.lead_paragraph: The Royal Mail steamer Africa, Capt. SHANNON, having sailed from Liverpool on Saturday the 26th ??, arrived at this port yesterday morning. Her advices are three days later than those by the City of Washington. The steamship Northern Light arrived out at Southampton on the morning of the 25th of June. On the 23d of June the House of Lords was not in session.

headline.main: LAW. INTELLIGENCE.; Important Decision in Admiralty--Interesting to Ship Owners. UNITED STATES DISTRICT COURT. UNITED STATES COMMISSIONER'S COURT. SUPREME COURT- SPECIAL TERM.

headline.main: The de Riviere Scandal--Letter from Mrs. Blount--The Capitals Gives Ball and Declines and Examination He is Served with a Habeas Corpas and a Don. The scandalous romance of Capt. DE RIVIERE and BLOUNTS, mother and daughter, continues to enliven the shades of Hoboken.

docs.lead_paragraph: The scandalous romance of Capt. DE RIVIERE and the BLOUNTS, mother and daughter, continues to enliven the shades of Hoboken, and the Hotel Napoleon is besieged by a crowd of curious visitors. As was expected, the Captain declined the preliminary examination yesterday, on the charge of larceny preferred by Col. BLOUNT, and gave bail in the sum of $1,000 to await the action of the Grand Jury in October.

headline.main: Conflict of Authorities in Philadelphia Mayor Henry Arrested and Discharged.

docs.lead_paragraph: A conflict between the State and City authorities has arisen in Philadelphia. The North American explains the origin of the difficulty: For the past two days the vicinity of the First District Station house, at the old Moyamensing Hall, has been in a high state of excitement, consequent upon the belligerent proceedings of the Health Officer, Mr. ARTHUR HUGHES on the one side, and the city police occupying the Hall, on the other.

headline.main: CUBA.; Movements of the British Squadron--Activity of the Slave-trade--Destruction of Highwaymen--Financial Affairs.

docs.lead_paragraph: The American Gulf Squadron are now busily engaged in cruising in search of her Britannic Majesty's gun-boats, and show themselves before the Moro Castle nearly every day. The Dolphin, Water Witch and Vixen entered the harbor, but after a brief stay, suited again to join their companions.

headline.main: INTERESTING FROM UTAH.; Peculiaities of the Indian Tribes in Utah. Interesting Particulars of Capt Marcy's Trip to New-Mexico. Preparations of the Army for the March on Salt Lake City. Provisions Plenty and Transportation Ample. ARRIVAL OF COL. HOFFMAN AND CAPT. MARCY. The Burning of the Supply Trains in October-Other Mormon Outrages.

docs.abstract: Letters from Simonton at Camp Scott
docs.lead_paragraph: My next communication will be dated on the march towards Salt Lake--for the present week has brought in all the supplies and troups for which the army of Utah have been postponing its advance. First came Colonel HOFFMAN with his supplies of provisions, clothing and forage ; and on the 9th instant Captain MARCY came into camp with over 900 mules and about 150 horses of the stock which he went to New-Mexico to purchase.
